body.name: WD_BLACK 4TB SN850X NVMe Internal Gaming SSD Solid State Drive - Gen4 PCIe, M.2 2280, Up to 7,300 MB/s - WDS400T2X0E
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Carolinas and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 4 hrs 45 mins
features: Get the ultimate gaming edge over your competition with insane speeds up to 7,300 MB/s(1) for top-level performance and radically short load times.
A range of capacities from 1TB to 4TB(2) means you get to keep more of today’s games that can take up 200GB(2) or more of storage.
The WD_BLACK Dashboard monitors your drive’s health, controls your RGB style and can automatically detect games to turn on Game Mode 2.0 (Windows only).
Predictive Loading, Overhead Balancing, and Adaptive Thermal Management features come to the SN850X to juice up your gaming performance.(3)
Supports future games developed for Microsoft’s DirectStorage technology for faster load times.
(1) Based on read speed. 1 MB/s = 1 million bytes per second. Based on internal testing; performance may vary depending upon host device, usage conditions, drive capacity, and other factors.
(2) 1GB = 1 billion bytes and 1TB = 1 trillion bytes. Actual user capacity may be less depending on operating environment.
body.description: Strap in for breakneck gaming speeds with the WD_BLACK SN850X NVMe™ SSD. Crush load times and slash throttling, lagging, and texture pop-ins for a smooth, fast experience that lets you compete at your absolute peak. This purpose-built gaming drive comes in capacities of 1TB to 4TB(2), with an optional heatsink on the 1TB and 2TB drives to help sustain top-end performance for more consistent gameplay. With the advanced features of Game Mode 2.0 (Windows only) automatically turned on by the WD_BLACK Dashboard and supporting Microsoft's DirectStorage technology, the WD_BLACK SN850X NVMe SSD delivers top-tier performance to keep you playing, streaming, recording, and dominating the game. (2) 1GB = 1 billion bytes and 1TB = 1 trillion bytes. Actual user capacity may be less depending on operating environment.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Get the Ultimate Gaming Edge Insane speeds up to 7,300 MB/s(1) deliver top-tier performance with ridiculously short load times for the elite gaming experience you’ve been waiting for.

More Room for More Games A range of capacities from 1TB to 4TB(2) means you get to keep more games at the ready and get into the action fast. More Control The WD_BLACK Dashboard monitors the health of your drive, control of RGB lighting and exclusively on the SN850X, Game Mode 2.0 (Windows only). Near-Max PCIe Gen4(3) Speeds Output nearing the PCIe Gen4 interface limits helps you get more out of storage and system components. DirectStorage Supported Supports Microsoft’s DirectStorage technology for future games that improves load times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good product, works as described, no problems
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. In general - all mentioned in this review products are as described and working as described. Almost all deserve 5 stars (commented if one or more stars are taken off). Instead of reviewing item by item I decided to write one review for all products used for one specific PC build. The purpose of this PC build - fancy compact gaming system.Items used in this build:--Item 1) OCPC Mini ITX Case, Hydra Italy Mini ITX PC Case, Amazon https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0BK6D77DG/Very good case – compact, cool looking and efficient. The black color is the only variant I found on Amazon. With only cooling from top-down CPU cooler, the i7-13700K based system passed the stress test very well. Riser cable is not included – actually the riser cable for GPU orientation as shown on Amazon item photo does not exist. In order to build the system as shown, I bought a flexible riser cable (Item #2) and twisted it to 180°. Another simpler solution is to install GPU upside down as presented by other reviewers on Amazon.--Item 2) EZDIY-FAB PCIE 4.0 16x Extreme High Speed Flexible Riser Cable PCI Express Port GPU Extension Card-Dual Reverse Connector for ITX [21cm]. Amazon https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B09S5DW3RX/-Does the job - exactly what I need for the project. Note: During system build I have to remove the bracket from the cable male connector and install it back after passing cable through the case hole.--Item 3) Power supply: Cooler Master V750 SFX Gold Full Modular, 750W, Amazon https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B08LP7B7FM/- Works as supposed to. PSU had a noticeable burning smell for about 5 days, considering this is normal for a new PSU. If you want to build more powerful gaming system, I recommend the PCIe 5.0 ready 850W SFX PSU, something like ARESGAME GL850 https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0CHDS4J33/SFX-L PSU will work in Hydra Mini as well, but cable management will be tougher.--Item 4) CPU: Intel Core i7-13700K, Amazon https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0BCF57FL5/- Good CPU, working well in gaming.--Item 5) Motherboard: ASUS ROG Strix B760-I Gaming WiFi, Amazon https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0BR8TVLPL/- Working as described, nice looking MB. Thank you, ASUS - now ROG motherboards have the Memtest86+ built in BIOS. This very helpful feature allows PC builders to check memory before operating system installation and prevent blue screens and failures during OS install and system use in case of defective memory.In my case originally ordered CORSAIR DOMINATOR PLATINUM RGB DDR5 RAM 64GB (2x32GB) 6400MHz (Amazon https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0C1R95SPW/) was defective. Both memory modules came to life and showed ok in BIOS but Memtest86+ got errors. I did test modules one by one in the same memory slot and found out that one of the modules is the cause of the failures. Returned the defective memory and bought another from a different brand (Item #6). ASUS ROG Motherboard chosen for the look. In my opinion the best Intel (or may be overall) mini ITX MB on the market is MSI MPG Z790I Edge WiFi Gaming Motherboard (Amazon https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0BHCJ6KQ2/ ) I own one and have a very best experience.--Item 6) Memory: TEAMGROUP T-Force Delta RGB DDR5 Ram 64GB (2x32GB) 6000MHz, Amazon https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0BNTV1945/-Very good product, works as described, nice looking, recognized by Aura Sync.--Item 7) Graphics Card: MSI Gaming GeForce RTX 4060 Ti 16GB, Amazon https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0CCFZMHSM/- Graphics card work as supposed to, have low power consumption. This GPU was chosen for the look only. Anyway, the presented system can play all modern games well at 1440p. But if you want the very good gaming experience, I will recommend at least RTX 4070 Ti like MSI Gaming GeForce RTX 4070 Ti Ventus 2X 12G OC. And the very best (talking about built on Hydra Italy Mini Case) will be the system with 850W PCIe 5.0 SFX PSU and:a) MSI MPG Z790I Edge WiFi Gaming Motherboard, Amazon https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0BHCJ6KQ2/b) Intel Core i9-13900KF, https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BCFM3CJ4/c) ASUS ProArt GeForce RTX™ 4080 16GB OC, ( Amazon https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0C75J66C8/). This compact GPU has included Graphics Card Holder which will work with presented builtI own all of these (a,b,c) components packed in another fancy mini ITX case (Phanteks PH-ES217A_BK02 Evolv Shift 2 Air Mini-ITX case, Fabric Side Panels) and they performed superb in games.--Item 8) SSD Disks:8.1) Primary (system): WD_BLACK 2TB SN850X NVMe Gen4 PCIe M.2 2280 WDS200T2X0E, Amazon https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0B7CMZ3QH/8.2) Secondary (backup and media data): Crucial P3 Plus 4TB PCIe Gen4 NVMe M.2 CT4000P3PSSD8, Amazon https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0B25M8FXX/- Very good products, works as described, no problems.--Item 9) Antec Power Supply Sleeved Cable, PSU Cables, PSU Extension Cable Kit / 1x24pin ATX / 2x8pin (4+4) EPS / 3X (6+2) pin PCI-E, 30cm Length with Combs, Dual EPS Red Amazon https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0BN3H2K17/- Perfect fit for this project, good cables, looks nice.--Item 10)CPU cooler: ID-COOLING IS-67-XT Black 67mm Height Low Profile CPU Cooler, Amazon https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0CFPY9CKZ/- Good design, keeps i7-13700K adequately cool in open Air PC Case. Mounting for regular size 120mm fan included. Easy installation - just install radiator 1st and mount fan after. ID-COOLING IS-67-XT chosen because of black color. In my opinion DeepCool AN600 Low Profile CPU Cooler (Amazon https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0C4P8ZPWT/) has a little bit better cooling performance (I have one in a very compact Flex ATX build).--Item 11) EZDIY-FAB Moonlight 120mm RGB PWM Case Fan, Amazon https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07X8T79QY/Good, quiet and nice-looking fan. Actually, it is a leftover piece from a 9 fans ATX tower system build. If you want to build a similar system with a similar look, I recommend Cooler Master MF120 Halo² Fan Duo-Ring ARGB (Amazon https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0BWKZGYXJ/). This fan has a similar look but has better airflow / air pressure.---Item 12) 24 Pin RGB Cable Extension Kit (used ARGB strip only), Amazon https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07WN4G7KC/- The power cable connector to MB too tight - did not go all the way down, afraid to broke the MB if try to apply more force (the regular PSU cable fits perfect). Connector to PSU too tight as well, but was able to connect all the way down. Actually, in reality the system with this cable does not look good (too much RGB). Did use ARGB strip only for decoration purposes on the GPU side.--Item 13) Thermal Paste: ARCTIC MX-6. Optional - I have a very good experience using this thermal paste brand and always using it for the builds (so thermal paste provided by ID-COOLING was not used). Amazon https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B09VDLH5M6/-----------Overall, I assume the goal is reached - the presented system can play recent games and look very cool (in my humble opinion).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, sensational ssd!
reviews.reviewText: My personal computer needed more storage, and this one’s faster and holds more than any other. It’s also fast! Better than Samsung by far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and extremely fast
reviews.reviewText: Bought this 3 months ago for $58.99 with heatsink now its doubled in price and probably will again in 2024 if not more from what I've been reading about the production of ssd component's slowing down and increasing in price in 2024. I would buy it now, been very reliable and crazy fast but needs a heatsink, all ssd's get extremely hot without one and will start to fail. I've had no issues and bought a second one before the prices go up higher. I put the first one in my PS5 and transferred 850gb in minutes and seems to load games faster than the PS5's own memory and it's working great. Also one of the fastest gen 4 SSD drives out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, if you build computers...
reviews.reviewText: I am such a storage geek! I already had a 1TB M.2 and 3 1TB SSDs in my computer. 4 TBs should be enough for anyone that isn't storing backups or editing a lot of photos or videos, right? Evidently not. OK, to be fair to me, storage geek, my 1 TB had a problem, well, maybe it was a PC problem, but I messed up the drive. The WD Black 4 TB was on sale, so I grabbed it. My motherboard has to M.2 slots, so I just dropped it in, rebooted, changed the boot sequence, and reinstalled Windows 10. (not a Win 11 fan) So, like I said in the headline, easy to install if you build computers. I still have the slightly troubled OS installed on my old WD Black 1TB and my games spread across the 3 SSDs, so I have 3-1/2 TBs of available drive space on my main drive. The drive is plenty fast for me. Windows comes up very quickly and it takes no time to save or open files. It is a great drive and I got it for a nice price. There are faster drives available, but be prepared to pay quite a bit more for them. I don't really know why you would need anything faster. It's like going 80 on the highway for 3 miles to get home faster. You only save a few seconds over going the speed limit.Buy this drive. It hasn't let me down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elevate Your Gaming Experience with Blazing-Fast Storage!
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐The WD_BLACK 4TB SN850X NVMe Internal Gaming SSD is a storage beast that revolutionizes your gaming and productivity experience with its astonishing speed and generous capacity.Pros: 1. Blistering Speed: The Gen4 PCIe interface and M.2 2280 form factor of this SSD offer speeds of up to 7,300 MB/s. This means lightning-fast loading times for games and near-instantaneous data access. 2. Massive Capacity: With 4TB of storage, you have ample space for your game library, multimedia, and work files. No more worrying about running out of storage or needing to juggle files. 3. Gaming Performance: The SSD is optimized for gaming, ensuring that your games load quickly and run smoothly, reducing lag and stuttering in resource-intensive titles. 4. WD_BLACK Dashboard: The WD_BLACK Dashboard software allows you to monitor your SSD’s performance and optimize it for your specific needs. 5. Reliable Brand: Western Digital is a trusted name in storage solutions, known for its quality and reliability. 6. M.2 Form Factor: The M.2 form factor allows for a clean and compact installation on compatible motherboards, saving space in your PC case.Cons: 1. Price: The combination of high capacity and Gen4 speeds comes at a premium. It might be overkill for users who don’t require the fastest storage or those on a tight budget.In summary, the WD_BLACK 4TB SN850X NVMe Internal Gaming SSD is a performance monster that transforms your gaming and storage experience. If you’re a gamer, content creator, or professional who demands the best in storage, this SSD is a top choice. While the price may be a barrier for some, the unparalleled speed and vast storage it provides make it a fantastic investment for high-end builds. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewTitle: Lightning-Fast Gaming Performance with WD_BLACK SN850X SSD!
reviews.reviewText: I recently upgraded my gaming rig, an R15, with the WD_BLACK 2TB SN850X NVMe Internal Gaming SSD, and I couldn't be happier with the results. This SSD delivers an incredible gaming experience that is both fast and reliable, with an added RGB effect.Firstly, the installation was a breeze thanks to the included heatsink. It not only keeps the drive cool during intense gaming sessions but also adds a sleek look to my PC build. The build quality is top-notch, which is what I expect from WD_BLACK products.Performance-wise, this SSD is a game-changer. Games load lightning-fast, and I've noticed a significant reduction in load times across all my titles. It's also made multitasking while gaming a breeze, thanks to its impressive read and write speeds.The 2TB storage capacity is generous, allowing me to install a large library of games without worrying about running out of space. It's perfect for gamers who want to keep their favorite titles readily available.Overall, the WD_BLACK SN850X NVMe SSD is a fantastic addition to any gaming setup. It combines superb performance with ample storage, and the included heatsink is the icing on the cake. If you want to take your gaming experience to the next level, look no further – this SSD is a must-have. Highly recommended!

Se lo compré a mi esposo para su ps5, es muy fácil de instalar no le costó trabajo, cumple las características de la descripción, y llegó en perfectas condiciones. Funciona muy bien para expandir la memoria de la consola. Excelente producto
Ssd perfeito ! Encaixa no play com muita facilidade a instalação foi mais de boa do q outro ssd q eu tinha. E a velocidade e melhor do q a do playstation . E caro mais e top de mais !

chegou rapido, veio lacrado dentro de sua embalagem original e dentro de outra caixa, ja instalado no ps5, o ssd de 2tb atingiu a velocidade de escrita de 6528 mb, o q é bem acima do recomendado pela sony.. vale a pena o investimento, na casa dos 1200 reais ja vale pegar e não arriscar colocando esses chineses.. estou satisfeito.
